description: Der Exoplanet Proxima Centauri B ist der nächste Planet außerhalb unseres Sonnensystems – und ein heißer Kandidat für die Suche nach Leben im All. Jetzt haben Forscher weitere Indizien dafür gesammelt.
title: Bilder der Woche: Prima Klima auf Proxima Centauri B

title: What’s new from Firebase at Google I/O 2017

author: Michael S. Schmidt
description: “I hope you can let this go,” the president told the F.B.I. director in an Oval Office meeting in February, according to a memo James B. Comey wrote.
title: Comey Memo Says Trump Asked Him to End Flynn Investigation

author: Rebecca R. Ruiz and Mark Landler
description: The decision came after a cascade of damaging developments for President Trump in the wake of his abrupt firing of the F.B.I. director, James B. Comey.
title: Robert Mueller, Former F.B.I. Director, Is Named Special Counsel for Russia Investigation

author: Brian Bennett
description: President Trump denied urging former FBI Director James B. Comey to close or back down from the bureau's investigation into Trump's for...
title: 'No, no, next question': Trump says he didn't urge Comey to back down on investigating Flynn

title: Schock im Augsburger Landgericht - Staatsanwalt springt vor Prozess aus drittem Stock

author: The New York Times
description: The Senate Intelligence Committee invited the former F.B.I. director James B. Comey to testify on reports that President Trump asked him to scuttle the investigation into Michael T. Flynn.
title: Senate Panel Asks Comey to Testify on Flynn and Trump

author: Elise Viebeck, Sean Sullivan, Mike DeBonis, Paul Kane, Elise Viebeck, Sean Sullivan, Mike DeBonis, Paul Kane
description: Both Democrats and Republicans reject Russia’s offer to provide record of Oval Office visit. And a key House committee asked the FBI for records of communications between the president and former director James B. Comey.
title: Congress shows growing concern over Trump controversies

description: Saarbrücken – Ihr gemeinsamer Spaß an Ballerspielen endete tödlich!Zugedröhnt mit Amphetamin stach Julien K. (22) auf seinen Kumpel Max B. († 23) in dessen Wohnung mit einer Haushaltsschere ein. 38
title: Nach vier Tagen Drogen und Dauer-Daddeln - Computerspieler mit 38 Stichen totgemetzelt

description: Stuttgart – Als Lackierer hatte Hüseyin B. (25) aus Dettingen an der Erms (BaWü) eigentlich keine Geldsorgen, erklärte er gestern im Amtsgericht Reutlingen.Trotzdem schickte er eine perfide *** BILDplus Inhalt ***
title: Er wollte 900 000 Euro - Trottel-Erpresser bedrohte Schumis Kinder!
